message: Let's start fair. I propose a 50/50 split.
My turn. How about a 60/40 split in my favor? It's still a good deal before inflation eats away at the value.
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, but I need a bigger share. Let's split it 65/35, recognizing that the value is decreasing for both of us.
Time is running out, Alice!  I'll take a slight hit with a 55/45 split.  This is your last chance for a decent share before inflation gobbles it up!
